definition: grease/greasy food/oily/rich (of food)/fatty/greasy and dirty/a slippery character
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Eat fat food less, no-noSmokeWine, answer to often maintain defecate unobstructed .
sentences.chinese: 少喫油膩食物，禁忌菸酒，並應經常保持大便通暢。

sentences.english: Lightweight and non-greasy, it absorbs quickly into skin.
sentences.chinese: 質地輕盈，不油膩，吸收迅速。

sentences.english: Are the carnitas slightly crispy on the outside, with an interior succulent with greasy goodness?
sentences.chinese: carnitas外表略脆，裏面卻多汁油膩嗎？

sentences.english: The doctor suggested him not to eat greasiness food.
sentences.chinese: 醫生建議他不要喫油膩的食品。

sentences.english: It can be easily used with freshing touch, non greasy, protect the skin with favorable moisturizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲乳霜，卻出人意料地易於塗抹，觸感清爽不油膩。

sentences.english: The visual, the pores clear, oily face, oily skin is no doubt.
sentences.chinese: 對視覺而言，毛孔明顯，臉上油膩則無疑是油性皮膚。

sentences.english: Oily skin after bathing, every mind and the body fluent in its landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴後皮膚油膩，渾身舒暢，氣血通順，心曠神怡。

sentences.english: My doctor told me not to eat fatty foods such as bacon or ham.
sentences.chinese: 我的醫生叫我不要喫油膩的食物，比如鹹肉或漢堡。

sentences.english: Excellent for those with sensitive, oily, or acne-prone skin.
sentences.chinese: 靈活油膩起痘痘的皮膚都可以用。

sentences.english: Goubuli's stuffed-buns are known for their generous filling, which is succulent but not greasy.
sentences.chinese: 狗不理包子是衆所周知的天津小喫，多汁但不油膩。

sentences.english: Greaseless food is more and more welcome to women.
sentences.chinese: 不含油膩的食品，越來越受到女士們的歡迎。

sentences.english: However, there was not obvious difference in the symptom of greasy scales between the two group.
sentences.chinese: 而兩組皮損上的油膩性鱗屑比較，差異無顯著性。

sentences.english: Frying onions. Local food is very greasy.
sentences.chinese: 油炸洋蔥，這裏的菜都很油膩。

sentences.english: Infuse skin with fresh, oil-free hydration all day, see it glow with health.
sentences.chinese: 爲皮膚注入大量保溼成分，清爽不油膩，滋潤一整天。

sentences.english: A very nourishing and non-greasy hand cream. Uses all natural ingredients from Southern Alps.
sentences.chinese: 一支非常幼滑滋潤而不油膩的護手霜。

sentences.english: A pall of oily black smoke drifted over the cliff-top.
sentences.chinese: 一團油膩的黑色煙霧飄到懸崖頂上。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
to whet the appetite/appetizing/to amuse oneself at sb's expense/to tease
to read smoothly (of text)/to blurt out (without thinking)/to suit one's taste (of food)
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
